content: I have something like {to_structure := {x := X, y := Y}} in my goal's conclusion. Is it possible to express generalize h : {to_structure := {x := X, y := Y}} = a somehow? (This particular formulation errors with invalid structure instance, identifier expected.)
You may need to give the name of each structure as generalize h : {foo . to_structure := {bar . x := X, y := Y}} = a
Oh. Thanks. That's going to be a little painful.
